com.cubeia.firebase.api.game.activator
Class DefaultActivatorConfig

java.lang.Object
  com.cubeia.firebase.api.game.activator.DefaultActivatorConfig

public class DefaultActivatorConfig
extends Object

This is a bean implementation of the default activator config file. It contains, the number of seats at the table, the minimum amount of tables the system should have, the minimum available (ie empty) table, the number of table to increment with, the time in milliseconds after which a table is considered "old" and available for removal, and the interval (in millis) in which to scan for changes.

Author:
lars.j.nilsson
